summary: This document consists of a series of email exchanges primarily involving Steve Marshal and other unnamed individuals discussing a real estate transaction. The emails detail the logistics of a title search and closing process for a property in Bradford, including requests for extensions and inquiries about relevant meeting minutes.

persons.name: Steve Marshal
persons.context: Steve Marshal is attempting to purchase a house in Bradford and is seeking assistance with the title search and closing process.

persons.name: Jen Marshal
persons.context: Jen Marshal is mentioned as the spouse of Steve Marshal, who was contacted regarding the real estate transaction.

connections.description: Steve Marshal is the husband of Jen Marshal, and they are both involved in the real estate transaction.

events.title: Effective Date of Purchase and Sale Agreement
events.description: The effective date of the Purchase and Sale Agreement (P&S) is noted as November 19, although the seller did not sign until November 20.

events.title: Scheduled Closing Date
events.description: The closing for the property purchase is scheduled for December 13.

keyFacts: Steve Marshal is looking to purchase a house in Bradford and has reached out for assistance with the title search.
The effective date of the Purchase and Sale Agreement is marked as November 19, 2019.
The closing date for the property purchase is set for December 13, 2019.
There is a discussion about needing an extension for the due diligence period related to the title search.
Jen Marshal is mentioned as Steve Marshal's spouse, indicating a personal connection in the transaction.
